summary: An urban mystery unfurls as one man pieces together the surreal meaning of hundreds of cryptic tiled messages that have been appearing in city streets across the U.S. and South America.
cast: Justin Duerr|Marc Duerr|Kevin Riley|Abby Miller|Steve Weinik|Colin Smith|Frannie Seybold|Anna Marie Thompson|Joe Raimondo|John T. Arthur|George Arone|Rose Pedula
title: Resurrect Dead: The Mystery of the Toynbee Tiles
